reviews.review: Don't play competitive if you're new to the game. Your teammates will hate you. Found out the hard way
Güzel oyun ama herkesinde dediği gibi hileler kalksa...

If you enjoy epic headshots out of nowhere, planting bombs,defusing bombs, getting kicked from toxic players, hearing kids scream in the mic, rage quits, epic comebacks,trolling teammates, shotgunning heads, wall banging, peeking,epic plays,rushing enemy team,your whole team gets killed,the enemy team gets killed in the first second, laughter and epic plays

this game is for you ;)
